If cooperations and universities want to remain competitive #KeepTheBest subsidized childcare must be part of the deal. Universal/subsidized childcare like French/Swedish/Canadian model (nothing is perfect) should be part of any post-COVID19 future. #UniversalChildCare https://t.co/fAfyVyeDNi

Thus disease severity can differ widely in #COVID19 patients, even amongst those we deem to be at high risk. This is the conundrum. In addition to the risk factors already identified, can we find a better way to predict & treat those who will get more severe disease? (3/n)

Yes, we know that some risk factors such as Age, Chronic Lung Disease, Obesity, Smoking, etc. are associated with severe COVID-19 disease. But for a given individual, it is hard to predict. Some apparently healthy 40 yo can die & >80% of 80 yo who get infected can survive. (2/n)

My apologies. Let‚Äôs try one better for the general public. 
#AAT Explainer. Many people get infected with #SARSCoV2, the virus that causes #COVID19. Of the ~20% that are symptomatic, some get very sick, some die. Who gets really sick and dies is hard to predict. (1/n) https://t.co/PJaf2QbDht

Allelic frequency of suboptimal AAT genotypes PiMZ, PiSS, PiSZ and PiZZ across Europe loosely matches the CFR from #COVID19. But I‚Äôm sure many other factors contribute. Aerosolized AAT early in disease may be a better option. ü§û https://t.co/t1IbEcoLo8

This is likely not an outlier either. The no. of #COVID19 recoverers in HK is minuscule (~4K) compared to world-wide #COVID19 recoverers (~16 million). So, one well-documented reinfection case in just 0.025% of COVID-19 recoverers 4.5mths post 1st Infx. 6 mths? 9 mths?

That people can get reinfected with #SARSCoV2 & that reinfection would result in mild/asymptomatic #COVID19 cases is not surprising despite the many limpid explications regarding naturally declining Ab titers. The‚ùìis whether asymptomatic reinfected persons are infectious. (2/3)

Should we be REALLY that surprised though? 5-15% of #COVID19 recovered patients make little to no detectable Nabs. Re-infection induces Ab response, patient remained asymptomatic (all good news) but high virus shedding (Ct~ 26) more concerning. Was the patient infectious? ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è(1/3)

The lack of a national policy has led to a heterogeneous pandemic in üá∫üá∏. Case load, mitigation policies, or medical infrastructure per se does not easily explain State level differences in CFR. No wonder numbers can be politicized so easily. #FollowTheScience #ExplainTheData https://t.co/pSGmDp2xG9

The central conundrum in this #COVID19 pandemic is the heterogeneity of diseases severity in #SARSCoV2 infected individuals. Our latest preprint  https://t.co/KehQi8rJWN provides a hypothesis & explanatory framework that might account for at least some of this heterogeneity (1/6)

Well, we now know that *Neut Ab* titers (NAT) in convalescent sera can vary by >10,000-fold. Our analysis of NAT in 4 different #COVID19 convalescent cohorts exemplifies this tremendous variance.  (5/n) https://t.co/mU0Rtedl4R

Continuation of previous thread of Convalescent Plasma Therapy, which the FDA just placed on hold its EUA for use in treating #COVID19. So, why is it so hard to detect a more obvious benefit given the>35K patients transfused and the soundness of the therapeutic strategy? (4/n) https://t.co/rFdaXROV66

The preprint on AMQ is VERY well-done! Lung-on-a chip-technology SHOULD be leveraged to screen for #COVID19 drugs. However, I am very worried AMQ has the same kind of toxic effects as CLQ/HCLQ. Prophylactic drugs need to have a higher safety bar than therapeutic drugs (1/n) https://t.co/9tCwEKVfoj

#COVID19 Vaccines & #COVID19 Convalescent Plasma Therapy #CoVConPlsmTx | Will provide full details when our MedRxiv and BioRxiv preprint links become live. Any standardized tests or reporting metrics must be robust & ‚Äúoperator-independent‚Äù across *diverse* labs and cohorts üåéüåèüåç

#COVID19 vaccines. Companies rush to show efficacy results for their vaccines. Yet everyone reports ‚Äúneutralization‚Äù titers differently. Read carefully. IC50, IC80, AUC (area under curve) end-point neutralization titers, all mean very different things. #DemanFullNeutCurves

Of the 20 #COVID19 convalescent Plasma Tx reports, <1/3 described any criteria for selecting donors. Only one used virus neut titers(VNT). Standardized reporting metrics for assessing VNT in vaccine & #COVConPlsmTx trials critical for efficacy comparisons! https://t.co/704zP04qkd
